attributes.review: ever sense the app has been downloaded to my phone, it had been working a bit slower. The app itself is complicated to work, especially at first, asking for all that information totally inappropriate. I feel as though i am being tracked and watched by the president through this app it needs to go .
attributes.title: This app makes me uncomfortable

attributes.review:
This app was laggy and had a lot of bugs,
There was pornography ads coming on the app very few seconds. The layout kept glitching and I couldn’t believe how bad this was, I should have known the app was bad when I saw how slow it was downloading, and how suspicious it was asking for my location, don’t waste your time, don’t download.
attributes.title: Worse app ever!!!! 😡😡😡

attributes.review: it took so long to download and after i downloaded it my phone started to glitch so bad, like the stimulation at the moment. just when you think it can’t get worse, the buttons start disappearing and you’re only left with three useless buttons! well one of them is just developer info but yeah the two other options don’t do much. plus why are they even notifying us of events when we don’t even get to attend them!? i’m sure trump has the money to send all his fans to his rallies, but not enough to give universal healthcare and higher minimum wage! honestly it’s so useless.
attributes.title: get rid of this app!

attributes.review: this app took a whole week to download and during that week i was un able to do anything on any of my devices because i a LoViNg tRuMp SuPpOrTeR rEalLy want to help my fAvOriTe orange to have another term. But once the app had loaded on my devices it was extremely glitchy and so disorganized i wasn’t able to help my dEaR pReSiDeNt run for 2020 president. sUcH a sHaMe.
attributes.title: terrible app and a terrible president

attributes.review: I wanted to write an amazing review of this app for the big guy in office the only way I can rate it honestly is if I give it a one star rating because that’s what it deserves
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and the it crashes every 5-7 min and one I downloaded it it ask me a lot of questions for example do you want notifications on how old are you when’s your birthday what state what city what address and many many more I can’t use this app without cringing or being disappointed #blm #hlm
attributes.title: This app is bad

attributes.review: This app is actually terrible. It doesn’t make any sense. The app is confusing to follow and never seems to follow up on anything it claims. It crashes and glitches causing unnecessary problems for everyone. It’s also super SLOW it takes forever to load and I end up closing it and giving up on everything
attributes.title: Worst app in history

attributes.review: Dad plz let me go, i’m tired of being kept off of social media and listening to your ignorant beliefs😓 did you know just how racist, homophobic, xenophobic, transphobic, sexist, and misogynistic you are? 😡i’m tired of hearing your hate speech, it’s like a disease spreading throughout our country because people aren’t wearing masks 😷 and the healthcare in this country has gone to 💩....... oh wait...... this is awkward.... anywaysssss
attributes.title: Help Barron 2020

attributes.review: I support our current president and always will! I just turned 18 and everything he has said and has done is something I will always support but this app just does not work? It’s very slow and lacky and the best way to support the president and all of his doings is by getting the app fixed and worked properly! Do something.
attributes.title: Doesn’t work?

Why didnt i see yves and chuu kissing?? why didnt i see blackpink is the revolution? or bts paved the way? this is app is a total scam because sana didnt pop up saying “likey like likey likey me likey likey likey dugun dugun dugun sgunu dugung heart heart” i didnt see wendy trying to ft me whilst chaeryoung and chaeyoung were dancing🧍🏽‍♀️the cheeto lied with what the app is about and im mad😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡1 star from me stan loona and stream me by clc
